entry.title: Proposal To Turn On Uniswap ‘Fee Switch’ Gains Early Support
entry.summary: An initial vote to monetize the Uniswap protocol has garnered near-unanimous support.

entry.title: Rally Pushes Crypto Market Capitalization Above $1 Trillion Is The Worst Behind Us?
entry.summary: Crypto market capitalization has surpassed $1T for the first time since June 12.

entry.title: ZK Roundup: Ethereum Scaling Projects Are Forging Ahead
entry.summary: Polygon, Matter Labs and Scroll have released updates on their Ethereum-compatible zero-knowledge rollups.

entry.title: Frustration Turned to Anger For Creditor Who Foresaw Three Arrows Collapse
entry.summary: Dutch Crypto Exchange Deribit Pleaded with 3AC Founders for Information to No Avail

entry.title: U.K. Government Takes Step on Making Stablecoins a Form of Payment
entry.summary: U.K. Chancellor Introduces Bill To Govern Pegged Tokens
